name: Ransomware Mitigation Playbook
description: This playbook handles an incident involving ransomware that encrypts critical files across multiple servers.

action--a67c0b27-4ee0-4c20-b8d1-5e0f3e53.name: Isolate infected systems
action--a67c0b27-4ee0-4c20-b8d1-5e0f3e53.description: Take infected systems offline to prevent further encryption.

action--6e8c2c64-c4ad-487b-8b46-0e81e5f1.name: Stop ransomware processes
action--6e8c2c64-c4ad-487b-8b46-0e81e5f1.description: Terminate the ransomware processes running on affected systems.

loop--7e3b6d0e-4619-4c9f-aef5-5c0909a6d7.name: Restore files from backup
loop--7e3b6d0e-4619-4c9f-aef5-5c0909a6d7.description: Restore files until all files are restored from backup.

action--bcb8b59c-b40b-4045-bc62-6f81f370.name: Execute restoration
action--bcb8b59c-b40b-4045-bc62-6f81f370.description: Restore the files from backup to the restoration directory.

check-restore-status--f7fe2cc9-eb04-418c.name: Check restoration status
check-restore-status--f7fe2cc9-eb04-418c.description: Check if all files have been restored successfully.

action--b31e820a-ea70-49d7-b949-fe338225.name: Inform team about missing backups
action--b31e820a-ea70-49d7-b949-fe338225.description: Notify the response team that no backups are available for restoration.

commands.command: echo 'No backups available for restoration. Immediate action needed.'

backup_exists.description: Flag to check if backup exists

all_files_restored.description: Flag to determine if all files have been restored
